metadata.title: CVE-2018-12562 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - high
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in the cantata-mounter D-Bus service in Cantatathrough 2.3.1. The wrapper script 'mount.cifs.wrapper' uses the shell toforward the arguments to the actual mount.cifs binary. The shell evaluateswildcards (such as in an injected string:/home/../tmp/* string).

criterions.comment: cantata: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
